titles.title: American Technology Advancement Act of 1993
A bill to advance the development and transfer of environmental and other nonmilitary technologies, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: 2/25/1993--Introduced. American Technology Advancement Act of 1993 - Obligates specified 1993 Department of Energy funds for nonmilitary technology assistance, including environmental research, to DOE national laboratories.
